ingredients.ingredient: 9 each Old El Paso taco shells
2 teaspoons Old El Paso taco seasoning mix
8 (6 inch) Old El Paso flour tortillas

cookingTips: Cook tilapia over medium-high heat for 3-4 minutes per side until flaky
Warm both taco shells and tortillas before serving for better texture and flavor
Keep filling components warm and separate until assembly for maximum freshness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook understand why offering both shells and tortillas gives guests options. What's the textural and flavor difference? How should each be prepared?
